import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link, navigate} from '@reach/router' import Mainpicture from '../images/life-satisfaction.svg' import Logo from '../images/logo.svg' const Register = (props) => { const [formState, setFormState] = useState({ username: "", password: "", confirm_password: "", firstname: "", lastname: "", email: "", }) const [errorState, setErrorState] = useState({ errors: "" }) const onChangeHandler = (event) => { setFormState({ ...formState, [event.target.name]:event.target.value }) } const onSubmitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:4000/users/create',formState) .then(response => { if(response.data.errors){ setErrorState({ errors: response.data.errors ? response.data.errors : "", }) } else { navigate ("/dashboard") } }) .catch(error=>console.log(error)) } return(

Bloom CMS V0.0.1

{errorState.errors}

By signing up, you agree to our Terms, Data Policy and Cookies Policy.

Already Registered? Login

) } export default Register;
